# Identifiers {#identifiers}

Taxonomic identifiers are the most important thing in `taxize`. We either need to get to an identifier for each name the user has, or take an identifier to do something else, for example get a taxonomic classification.

## Usage {#search-usage}

```{r}
library(taxize)
```
